ShortDescription.Value: Extra Lib is a necessary dependency module needed to operate all EXTRA modifications.

Publish.LongDescription:
Extra Lib is a crucial dependency mod that is indispensable for the operation of any tools within the EXTRA mod suite. It ensures seamless integration and enhanced functionality across the entire mod collection.
Special thanks to YenYang, T.D.W and krzychu124 for their invaluable tips and assistance with coding and is help with the UI, as well as to CityRat for their exceptional contributions to thumbnails and all related graphic design work.
# Translation ⚠️ This mod uses crowdin so there maybe inconsistencies with translations due to translations from different translators ⚠️ - ✔️French 100% : aricoseco, Morgan Touverey Quilling (mtouverey), Edou24 - ✔️Chinese Simplified 100% : RilkeXS(无手文) (RilkeXS), 一叶杳舟 (Yao_Zhou) - ✔️Chinese Traditional 100% : CBEdwin, allegretic, Hans Law (ZENITHALIZE) - ⚠️German 89% : Konsi, Jannik Bartmann (raptor09), KaeseKuchen (KaeseMitKuchen), FearMyFeedEU - ⚠️Italian 87% : Stefano (Furios) - ⚠️Japanese 89% : karigane - ⚠️Korean 89% : Hinanchovo - ✔️Polish 100% : Lisek, karmel68 - ✔️Portuguese 100% -> [European Portuguese Localization mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/92599/Windows) - ⚠️Portuguese, Brazilian 87% : Miguel Pereira Campos (mpcamposz) - ⚠️Russian 89% : MrSandcraft, Mihail (kaktyc), Denis Lee (B3lka), Sergey (TraceXR) - ✔️Spanish 100% : elGendo87
